prompt: Create a vibrant forgot password screen with gradient background transitioning from purple at top to blue at bottom. Use Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.stretch for full-width elements, centered vertically. Display white 'Password Reset' title, font size 32, bold. Add white subtitle with 70% opacity saying 'Enter your email for a reset link.' Include TextField with white background, rounded border, gray hint text 'Your Email', and purple email prefix icon. Add full-width ElevatedButton with purple background, white 'Send Reset Link' text, and rounded corners. Place white 'Back to Login' TextButton below. Use 28px padding and 18px spacing between elements.
